name: Lectro (itch)
description:
Simple one tap controls move you from one dot to the next dot. A plus dot speeds up your rotation, a minus dot slows down your rotation, just don't miss a dot or it's game over!

Features:

◉ Simple one tap controls

◉ Leaderboard to compete with friends and the rest of the world

◉ Beautiful minimalist graphics

◉ Endless gameplay
